author: Jessica Ling
comment: Very beautiful!

author: Alma Rodriguez
comment: Simple, pretty, nice to look at! Just what I wanted!

author: Jacqui Charles
comment: This is the only watch face I've loved enough to purchase. It's pretty, and it has the date! (Usually you can get one or the other, but not both). I have it set to change hourly which keeps me entertained.
title: Love this face!

author: Siobhán Keane
comment: Since the last update, I can't change the ambient display. It's stuck on full.
title: Love it but...

author: Alison Biggs
comment: I'd really like to use 24hr time on the main watch face. Is that possible? I have it on the ambient face.
title: Love this but......

author: Sergey Wain-Fellowes
comment: Love the spring watch faces. It's so fresh looking and has a great clean design. Only thing I'd like, is if we the customer could chose what watch face colour / look we want. I appreciate the thought but it would be nice to have the freedom to choices what watch face we'd like that day. As some of the daily designs on a given day are not to my liking. Many thanks!
title: Wonderful watch face!

author: Jaki Robinson
comment: I really liked this watch face, so much so that I paid for it, but then it wouldn't change from 24 hr format to 12 hr format, so I got a refund. I really like it though, it's pretty and simple and what I wanted so it made me sad to return it. UPDATED 6/10/15, they let me know that the time format has been updated so I checked it out and it works perfectly now, switches between time formats right away, so I'm happy and changed my rating to 5 stars :)

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback! The time format is now updated. Go check it out!

title: It was so cute

author: Lucy Choisser
comment: I have installed, uninstalled, etc., but the face will only show 24 hour time. The set time to 12 hour choice in settings does not respond. Frustrating! Otherwise, lovely.

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback! The time format is now updated. Enjoy!

title: Pretty but time only 24 hour

author: tammy burden
comment: Absolutely love the spring colors !!! AND to be honest the simplicity of it is awesome. I hate a busy face. Oh and it works awesome with my LG watch
title: Love this watch face

author: Anna H
comment: Will not show up as an option to change the face, and the developers will not answer my emails asking for help. Paid for nothing.

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content: We're sorry for being late on our response! Our support team has gone through a 'modification' and has not been on their toes until now. We've updated the watchface into a new version so please go give it a try! Again, we apologize for the inconvinience.

title: Does not work with my Moto 360

author: Ashley Bifano
comment: I did have an issue with adding my clock face but the team helped me solve it.

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content: Thanks for your feedback! All of our watchfaces are designed to work for any Android Wear. The watchface not showing up as an option is a very common data connection issue between the Moto360 and smartphone. If you're still having this problem and would like to receive a step by step solution, please send us an email at watchfacedesigner@gmail.com!

title: Problem solved

author: Angelina Walton
comment: This is the only girly settings for my lg watch. I am in love with the daily different themes and colors. Please make another like this one with make-up and purses.
title: Girly Girl

author: Jennifer Casper
comment: I'm thrilled with the watch face! It makes my watch look more girly and I love how I can customize the ambient mode to prolong my battery life too.
title: So Pretty!

author: Ginny Jones
comment: I love it but I'm having trouble switching from the 24hr clock to the 12 hr clock.
title: Hours need to switch

author: Tutti Quintella
comment: Very beautiful faces, one for each day of the week so I won't get bored. Awesome.
title: Clean and beautiful

author: Trish Galimore
comment: This is a joy to have on my Moto 360, and the simplicity of its beauty is the best part!
title: A lovely watchface!

author: Kim Baltz
comment: Finally a beautiful watch face for us girls.  Looks great on my Moto 360.
title: Beautiful, simple design.

author: Justin Rossetti
comment: Can we stop the colors from changing daily?
title: Always pink

author: Marylynn Danh
comment: Patience was key. The settings do change but give it some time
title: Hour settings

author: Yolanda Nelson
comment: These are the most beautiful spring time watch faces on the app store

author: Sharon Hau
comment: So pretty, love it!

author: Diana Morales
comment: Love it!
title: Zenwatch

author: Daisia Crews
comment: Love it sooo much.

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content: Thank you for your positive input!

title: 👍👍👍

author: ღ ღ
comment: Fabulous
title: Yoka

author: Agnieszka Szambelan
comment: Beautiful!

author: Rosio Solis
comment: The app will not let me change the time from 24hr to 12hr, I followed directions per manufacturer and it would not change. I restart both my watch and phone, and finally I Uninstalled and reinstalled and wouldn't allow me to change the time display. I would like a refund or the problem to be fixed. Will try a different app in the mean time
title: Does not work w my moto 360

author: Nicole Smith
comment: Not compatible with moto360. No option on watch or on andriod wear app to install.

reply.author: WatchMaster
reply.content: Hello! We apologize for the inconvenience :( However, all of our watchfaces are totally compatible with Moto 360! We run thorough tests before the release of our watchfaces. The issue occurs quite often due to unstable connection between the devices. Please email us at ask.watchmaster@gmail.com for easy steps to fix this issue.
